title: The Black Dog
description: Jayden is an 8-year-old boy who loves nothing more than climbing tall trees with his many friends. Some days Jayden feels an overwhelming sadness. But sometimes Jayden can t explain it using his words. He just describes it as the black dog coming to visit. Join us for the third instalment of our award-winning #BreakingTheSilence series.
author: Tracey Lawrence
